homePage.description: I'm a software engineer and software developer based in Brasilia, Brazil. My goal is to help deliver as much value as possible for my employer and their clients. Get to know a little more about me and my skills below.

aboutPage.description: My name is Victor, I have a bachelor's degree in Software Engineering from the University of Brasília (UnB). In the job market, I worked for a year and a half at Tata Consultancy Services(TCS) as a junior backend developer, using JAVA as the main development language, but thanks to that experience, I also learned Angular and Spring Boot. I have experience with Java, JSP, JSF, Spring Boot, Java Android, Kotlin, Angular, Python Django, Rest API, as well as agile methodologies such as SCRUM and XP.
aboutPage.name: Victor Hugo Lopes Mota

education.degree: Certificate in English Language Level B1+

experience.title: Trainee
experience.description: Assisting with industry functions such as scheduling appointments, working with HTML, CSS, JS and using Liferay to maintain pages for the Federal Senate. In addition to these functions, I also worked on the management, monitoring and mapping of projects using the Bizagi tool.

experience.title: Junior Java Backend Developer
experience.description: I worked on the backend, focusing on Java technologies, and Angular. In this job I was responsible for implementing, testing and if necessary performing maintenance on customer systems. In this work we used an adaptation of the SCRUM methodology, so the main rites such as daily diaries, sprint review and code development were performed in teams. My focus was the backend with Java, but I also developed using JSP, JSF, Angular and Spring Boot.

experience.title: Junior Java Backend Developer
experience.description: In this work, I work exclusively with Java, we use SCRUM as a development method and the Liferay framework as support for the client's software deliverables.
